mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.clinic_type_name AS "clinicTypeName", a.clinic_type_code AS "clinicTypeCode", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO clinic_type_setting( id, org_id, clinic_type_name, clinic_type_code, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orgId}, #{clinicTypeName}, #{clinicTypeCode}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE clinic_type_setting SET org_id = #{orgId}, clinic_type_name = #{clinicTypeName}, clinic_type_code = #{clinicTypeCode}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
